message.body: Louanne wanted to know if you got the job at the VS by Montclair. She says they called her, and she gave you a great recommendation =P
they haven't called me back yet haha but Feridia (the store manager) told me the other day that she's call me to "work out the logistics" after she spoke to Louanne haha
That sounds like good news! Maybe I'll visit you up there
you should! the store is huge! :P
Haha, that's awesome! Where is it again?
That's like 10 minutes from Montclair! I'll swing by sometime soon
